name: KINGDOM of SoulArcher [Demo]
description:
This is our team's second game.

* It was made with the motif of the northern war of "Joseon", the ancient kingdom of Korea.

* This is a top-view shooting game.

* Upgrades + items can be purchased.

* With the roguelite element, the player level of the stage is initialized every time.

< Gameplay >

*camp

mouse click

*battle

+ Mouse operation + Arrow keys + A/S key operation to play

1 story stage

1 hunting stage

1 boss stage

Thank you for playing.

log: www.facebook.com/onehandedclick
